body_en: The siege of Mariupol, with many civilian casualties, was presented in the Russian media as a battlefield against "Nazis". In Mariupol, according to the Russian media, "Nazis" (often represented by the fighters of the "Azov" battalion), "terrorise the inhabitants".
name: mythical-nazis-16-DefaultText
chart_comment: here is nice to show connection between Mariupol and "nazis"
